Article Title: Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wife Celeste Desjardins just can‚Äôt stop reliving her dream wedding; Labels it ‚ÄúHappiest day of our lives‚Äù
Article Text:
Leon Draisaitl and Celeste Desjardins‚Äô magical wedding moments (Image via: Getty Images)

Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wife Celeste Desjardins shares wedding pictures; Connor McDavid and Lauren Kyle spotted

Leon Draisaitl shows it‚Äôs not just Hockey‚ÄîCelebrating love and life with Celeste

Edmonton Oilers superstar Leon Draisaitl and his wife, Celeste Desjardins , recently treated fans to an exclusive look at their dream wedding in France. The couple exchanged vows in a stunning French chateau, blending romance, luxury, and the warmth of family and NHL friends. Sharing glimpses on social media, Celeste called it ‚Äúthe happiest day of our lives,‚Äù giving fans a front-row seat to their fairytale celebration.Celeste Desjardins treated fans to a special glimpse of their wedding with a heartfelt Instagram post captioned: ‚Äú08.02.2025 ‚Äì the happiest day of our livesü§ç I love you forever! @drat_29.‚Äù She shared 20 snaps in a carousel, giving followers an intimate look at their unforgettable day.The wedding brought together close friends, family, and a few NHL stars, creating a private yet star-studded celebration. From heartfelt vows to candid laughter and dancing with loved ones, the day perfectly blended romance and luxury.Her Instagram highlights captured every angle of the celebration, from the couple‚Äôs first kiss as newlyweds to cheerful family portraits, happy tears, laughter, and lively reception snapshots that radiated togetherness.Connor McDavid and his wife, Lauren Kyle, were also spotted joining the joyous festivities. Each image and clip reflected the deep love, elegance, and connection shared among guests. Leon responded to the posts, writing, ‚ÄúCouldn‚Äôt agree more ‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù perfectly capturing their love and connection beyond the rink.As one of the NHL‚Äôs biggest stars, Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wedding with Celeste Desjardins has drawn massive attention from both hockey fans and lifestyle followers, making it a trending moment beyond the ice.While their dreamy wedding captured global attention online, Leon Draisaitl continues to shine on the ice. Fresh off an incredible NHL season, his scoring and playmaking skills have solidified his reputation as one of the league‚Äôs elite forwards. Yet beyond the rink, this personal milestone underscores a side of Draisaitl that fans rarely see‚Äîhis devotion to love, family, and life‚Äôs meaningful moments.The Draisaitl-Desjardins wedding is memorable not just for its lavish setting but for its emotional depth and relatability. Fans are drawn to the seamless blend of luxury, heartfelt interactions, and glimpses into the couple‚Äôs life beyond hockey. From intimate family moments to joyous celebrations with friends, every shared memory highlights the human side of the NHL star. The event also showcased the close bond between Leon Draisaitl and his wife, Celeste Desjardins with Edmonton Oilers teammate Connor McDavid and his wife, Lauren Kyle, reflecting the friendships that extend beyond the rink. By posting these moments, Celeste ensures the magic of their day continues to resonate with fans, making it a story that transcends sports headlines and lingers in the hearts of those following their journey.Also Read: Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wife Celeste Desjardins gives fans a glimpse of Saint-Tropez fam-jam vacation with Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife Lauren Kyle
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers superstar leon draisaitl and his wife, celeste desjardins, recently married in france. The couple exchanged vows in a stunning french chateau, blending romance, luxury, and the warmth of family and nhl friends. The wedding brought together close friends, family, and a few nhl stars, creating a private yet star-studded celebration.

Article Title: Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf relationship timeline: Tennis power couple, love story, wedding, children and life after retirement
Article Text:
Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf relationship timeline: Tennis power couple, love story, wedding, children and life after retirement (Image via Getty)

How Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf met

Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf love story

Steffi Graf and Andre Agassi family life



Recent updates on Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf life in 2025

Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf are one of tennis‚Äôs most loved couples. Their story is about love, respect, and family. Both were champions on the court, but their greatest win was finding each other. They met as rivals, grew close as friends, and later built a strong life together. Today, they are proud parents who inspire fans around the world. Their bond shows how two legends found happiness beyond tennis.Andre first saw Steffi on TV in the early 1990s. He said her calm and natural grace caught his attention.In 1992, both won Wimbledon. A champions‚Äô dance was planned but later canceled. They only shook hands and spoke for a short time.In 1999, their coaches arranged a surprise practice session. Andre was ending his first marriage. Steffi was also single. That meeting changed everything.Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf started dating soon after reconnecting. Two years later, they married on October 22, 2001.The wedding was private. It took place at their home in Las Vegas. Only their mothers were there.Days later, their son Jaden Gil was born. In 2003, their daughter Jaz Elle joined the family.They clicked because they understood each other‚Äôs struggles. Both were raised by strict parents. Both carried the heavy pressure of being tennis stars.Andre Agassi once said Steffi Graf was ‚Äústronger and clearer‚Äù than him. She helped him deal with life and sport.Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf never forced tennis on their kids. They wanted Jaden and Jaz to have freedom.Steffi Graf has often said her happiest times are at the family table. She loves noisy, fun meals with Andre and the children.Their home is private, warm, and full of love. For them, family always comes first.In April 2025, Andre Agassi played pickleball for the first time as a pro. He partnered with Anna Leigh Waters and won a mixed doubles title.Also Read: Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf combined net worth 2025: Tennis power couple history, fortune, children, legacy and more Andre Agassi said he and Steffi never play against each other. They only play on the same side.In September 2025, Jaz was spotted cheering for Andre at the Laver Cup. She supported him as he captained Team World.Jaz Agassi also made headlines when she visited Germany with her boyfriend. It was a rare public trip to her mother‚Äôs homeland.Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf‚Äôs story is simple but powerful. It is about two people who built trust, love, and family beyond their tennis fame.Andre Agassi recently said Steffi Graf remains his ‚Äúbiggest strength,‚Äù while Graf shared that Agassi‚Äôs humor still keeps their marriage joyful.
Article Summary: Andre agassi and steffi graf are one of tennis‚Äôs most loved couples. Their story is about love, respect, and family. Both were champions on the court, but their greatest win was finding each other. Today, they are proud parents who inspire fans around the world.

Article Title: Inside Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner‚Äôs private love story that has lasted more than 15 years
Article Text:
Sidney Crisby & Kathy Leutner (Getty Images)

Who is Kathy Leutner and what does she do for a living?

A relationship rooted in privacy and shared passions

Sidney Crosby may be one of the NHL‚Äôs most celebrated players, but when it comes to his personal life, the Pittsburgh Penguins captain has always preferred to keep things private. For more than 15 years, Crosby has shared his life with Kathy Leutner, a model who has built her own impressive career away from the rink. Their relationship, while mostly out of the public eye, has captured the curiosity of fans who rarely get a glimpse into Crosby‚Äôs off-ice world.Kathy Leutner began her modeling career in 2005, but it was her 2011 appearance in Sports Illustrated that gave her the major breakthrough. Since then, she has worked with several fashion and lifestyle brands, including Abercrombie & Fitch, Hollister, Faviana, and Famous. Originally from Chantilly, Virginia, Leutner now resides in Halifax, Nova Scotia, alongside Crosby.What makes her stand out is her decision to live away from the spotlight. Unlike many partners of professional athletes, Leutner avoids social media, which has only added to the intrigue around their relationship.Still, she is often spotted supporting Crosby at games, a consistent presence throughout his career.The couple first met in 2008 through a mutual friend, when Sidney Crosby was just 21 years old and quickly rising as one of hockey‚Äôs brightest stars. Leutner, who was also an athlete in high school, shared Crosby‚Äôs passion for sports‚Äîsomething that likely strengthened their connection from the beginning.Over the years, Crosby has hoisted the Stanley Cup three times and added multiple individual honors, including three Ted Lindsay Awards and two Hart Trophies. Meanwhile, Leutner has carved out her own path in fashion, proving her staying power in a competitive industry.Also Read: ‚ÄúHe is eligible‚Äù: Golden Knights spark outrage as they close in on controversial Carter Hart signing Despite their successes, both Crosby and Leutner have chosen to prioritize privacy, letting their accomplishments speak louder than headlines. For fans, their enduring bond is a reminder that even in the high-pressure world of professional sports, some love stories can thrive quietly, away from constant public attention.
Article Summary: Sidney crosby and kathy leutner have been together for more than 15 years. The model has built her own career away from the rink. Unlike many partners of professional athletes, she avoids social media. She is often spotted at games, a consistent presence throughout his career.

Article Title: What led former Dolphins star Xavien Howard to retire after only four games with the Colts?
Article Text:
Xavien Howard retires (Getty Images)

Did a rough outing against Puka Nacua prompt Xavien Howard to suddenly retire from the NFL?



Colts face new defensive challenges without Howard



Xavien Howard, the four-time Pro Bowler, has stunned the NFL by retiring mid-season after just four games with the Indianapolis Colts. The 32-year-old cornerback, who joined the Colts in August after sitting out the 2024 season, announced his decision following a challenging performance against the Los Angeles Rams, where star receiver Puka Nacua dominated. Howard was officially placed on the Colts‚Äô reserve/retired list on Wednesday.In an emotional Instagram post, Howard explained his choice to step away from the game. ‚ÄúWhen I was away from the game in 2024, I fell in love with taking my kids to school, doing activities with them and watching them grow up,‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúUp to that point I had always put my family after football. I‚Äôm no longer willing to do so. So today I am retiring from the National Football League. My purpose has been fulfilled in this sport, but my kids are more important to me than football. I‚Äôve had a hell of a career, and even though it‚Äôs ending in a unique way, I‚Äôm cool with that because for once I am putting my family first and I‚Äôm proud about that decision.‚ÄùHoward‚Äôs retirement underscores a growing trend of players prioritizing family over the game. After nine NFL seasons, including eight with the Miami Dolphins, Howard leaves behind a decorated career highlighted by four Pro Bowls, a first-team All-Pro selection in 2020, and two seasons leading the league in interceptions.Howard‚Äôs final games with the Colts included four starts, 11 tackles, and one fumble recovery. However, he struggled in coverage, particularly against Nacua, allowing 112 yards and a touchdown on seven completions from 10 targets. Pro Football Focus ranked him 156th out of 164 corners this season, and his 36.1 PFF grade was among the lowest in the league.Indianapolis, now 3‚Äì1, will face the Raiders at Lucas Oil Stadium this Sunday without Howard in the secondary. Despite the abrupt exit, Howard leaves a legacy as one of the NFL‚Äôs top cornerbacks of his era, reminding fans that even elite athletes sometimes choose life off the field over career records.Also Read: "That's insane": Tom Brady praises IShowSpeed‚Äôs unexpected sports skills, jokes streamer could trash-talk his way into NFL
Article Summary: Xavien howard retires from the nfl after just four games with the indianapolis colts. The 32-year-old cornerback joined the colts in august after sitting out the 2024 season. In an emotional instagram post, howard explained his choice to step away from the game.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors Predicted to Cut Ties With $48 Million Superstar Amid Midseason Heat Deal Talks
Article Text:
Stephen Curry and Jonathan Kuminga (Image via Imagn).

Golden State Warriors

Jonathan Kuminga

Bleacher Report Links Jonathan Kuminga to Heat Trade

Jonathan Kuminga (Image via Getty).

Why Wiggins Makes Sense for the Golden State Warriors

Background: Jonathan Kuminga and the Heat‚Äôs Longstanding Link

What‚Äôs Next for the Warriors?

Possible Trade Snapshot

Warriors Receive Heat Receive Andrew Wiggins



Jonathan Kuminga





Themay have securedon a fresh two-year, $48.5 million deal this offseason, but that doesn‚Äôt guarantee the young forward‚Äôs long-term future in San Francisco. In fact, multiple reports suggest the 6-foot-7 forward could be moved to the Miami Heat before the 2025-26 NBA trade deadline.Bleacher Report‚Äôs Andy Bailey has outlined a potential midseason trade scenario where Jonathan Kuminga heads to Miami in exchange for former Warrior Andrew Wiggins.‚ÄúWould the Warriors be interested in an Andrew Wiggins reunion,‚Äù Bailey wrote. ‚ÄúThey parted ways with one of the most important players from their 2022 title run to land Jimmy Butler, but the situation with Miami has evolved to the point that it should be interested in stockpiling younger talent.‚Äù (H/t Sporting News)Bailey further explained that Miami‚Äôs current build around Tyler Herro and Bam Adebayo lacks the ceiling of a true contender without Butler. Focusing on younger players like Jaime Jaquez Jr., Nikola Joviƒá, Kel‚Äôel Ware, Kasparas Jakuƒçionis, and potentially Kuminga would be a step toward long-term stability.For the Golden State Warriors , reuniting with Wiggins offers familiarity and flexibility. His ability to play within Golden State‚Äôs read-and-react system gives him an immediate advantage.Key potential roles for Wiggins if the trade goes through:‚Ä¢ Sixth man behind the starting core, similar to DeMar DeRozan‚Äôs role suggestion‚Ä¢ Option to play as a jumbo 2-guard alongside Stephen Curry, Jimmy Butler, Draymond Green, and Al Horford‚Ä¢ Reliable 3-and-D presence to space the floor and defend multiple positionsWiggins‚Äô consistency from beyond the arc and defensive versatility could prove more valuable for Golden State than investing further in Kuminga‚Äôs development.This isn‚Äôt the first time Jonathan Kuminga and the Heat have been connected. As far back as December 2024, reports tied him to Miami when Golden State‚Äôs season began to unravel. Speculation grew that a swap involving Jimmy Butler and Kuminga would reshape both franchises.However, on February 5, the Golden State Warriors instead packaged Andrew Wiggins in a blockbuster deal to land Butler. That decision shifted the narrative but also left unresolved tension between Kuminga and the organization.If Golden State revisits trade talks midseason, sending Kuminga to Miami in exchange for Wiggins could check multiple boxes:‚Ä¢ Short-term: Keep the roster competitive with veterans who fit seamlessly‚Ä¢ Long-term: Avoid committing major money to Kuminga while stabilizing the rotationKuminga‚Äôs future with the Golden State Warriors appears uncertain despite his lucrative new contract. With the team prioritizing stability around Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler, reuniting with Wiggins may offer Golden State the balance it needs for another playoff push. Meanwhile, Miami could use Jonathan Kuminga as a cornerstone in its youth-driven rebuild.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers Predicted Cut Ties with $18,483,220 Sharpshooter; Exploring Possible Fillers As Andy Bailey noted, the deal could represent a smart move for both sides - Golden State gaining a proven fit, and Miami looking toward the next era of Heat basketball.
Article Summary: Jonathan kuminga and the miami heat have been linked for years. Bleacher report‚Äôs andy bailey has outlined a potential midseason trade scenario. Golden state warriors receive heat receive andrew wiggins if the trade goes through. The deal could represent a smart move for both sides - golden state gaining a proven fit and miami looking toward the next era of heat basketball.

Article Title: Connor McDavid‚Äôs contract extension in doubt after Kirill Kaprizov deal: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think Oilers can afford to,‚Äù says Frank Seravalli
Article Text:
Connor McDavid's contract future with the Edmonton Oilers is under intense scrutiny following Kirill Kaprizov's massive deal. Despite McDavid's potential for a record-setting salary, the Oilers face significant cap challenges due to existing high-value contracts. McDavid prioritizes winning a Stanley Cup, suggesting he might accept less to ensure a competitive team, forcing Edmonton to find creative financial solutions.

Frank Seravalli weighs in on Connor McDavid‚Äôs future after Kirill Kaprizov‚Äôs $136M deal

Connor McDavid‚Äôs goal: The best team around him with a genuine chance to win

Level of concern with McDavid potentially leaving?

Connor McDavid‚Äôs dilemma is to win now or cap later

Connor McDavid‚Äôs future with the Edmonton Oilers has once again taken center stage in NHL contract discussions. After Minnesota Wild forward Kirill Kaprizov secured an eight-year, $136 million extension this week, the attention immediately shifted to what Edmonton‚Äôs superstar captain might demand when his next deal comes up. The Oilers are already weighed down by big-money contracts that could limit how far they can go for McDavid.While McDavid is expected to set the market whenever he signs, Edmonton‚Äôs financial structure complicates the picture. The Oilers are currently locked into expensive long-term commitments. Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs $14 million salary, Evan Bouchard‚Äôs double-digit deal, and Darnell Nurse‚Äôs $9.25 million contract already consume a large portion of the cap. On top of that, goaltender Stuart Skinner is due for a significant raise in the near future.NHL insider Frank Seravalli highlighted this challenge, stating, "They can't, I don't think the Edmonton Oilers can afford to go more. In fact, I don't think on their cap that they can really even afford to go 17 million, um, because of all the other deals that they've got." That kind of financial squeeze makes it difficult for the Oilers to entertain numbers north of $17 million annually ‚Äî a figure that insiders believe McDavid could command.Even with the NHL‚Äôs salary cap set to climb in the coming seasons, Edmonton‚Äôs roster construction leaves little margin to maneuver.Oilers GM Stan Bowman addressed Connor McDavid‚Äôs contract situation on Wednesday, admitting there is still no clarity on whether the superstar captain will have a new deal before the regular season begins. Bowman revealed via TSN that ongoing talks with McDavid‚Äôs agent Judd Moldaver remain frequent but offered no firm timeline, stressing, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt like to make predictions, we‚Äôll see where it goes.‚ÄùBeyond the financial puzzle, McDavid‚Äôs decision may come down to competitiveness. The Oilers have enjoyed success over the past two years, but McDavid understands that aging players, a thin prospect pipeline, and limited draft picks can quickly derail momentum.For McDavid, the question is not simply ‚Äúhow much‚Äù but ‚Äúhow far can this team go?‚Äù He has made it clear throughout his career that chasing a Stanley Cup defines his priorities. That means Edmonton must strike a balance ‚Äî paying its franchise player while still building the depth required to compete against the league‚Äôs best.Kaprizov‚Äôs blockbuster contract raised expectations league-wide, but McDavid‚Äôs case is different. He may ultimately accept less than his maximum value if it ensures the Oilers remain contenders. At the same time, Edmonton must find creative ways to manage the salary cap or risk losing the most dominant player in the game.McDavid‚Äôs decision will shape not just the Oilers‚Äô future, but also the landscape of the NHL. His contract situation is now one of the defining storylines of the league.Also Read: Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wife Celeste Desjardins just can‚Äôt stop reliving her dream wedding; Labels it ‚ÄúHappiest day of our lives‚Äù
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid's contract future with the edmonton oilers is under intense scrutiny following kirill kaprizov's massive deal. The oilers are already weighed down by big-money contracts that could limit how far they can go for mcdavid. Mcdavid prioritizes winning a stanley cup, suggesting he might accept less to ensure a competitive team.

Article Title: "NFL treats me...": Stacey Dales draws NFL comparison while recalling awkward WNBA moment under commissioner Cathy Engelbert
Article Text:
NFL reporter and ex-WNBA star Stacey Dales calls out commissioner Cathy Engelbert (Getty Images)

Stacey Dales shares her personal WNBA experience



Collier‚Äôs critique highlights player frustrations



Stacey Dales, senior NFL Network reporter and former WNBA All-Star, has publicly voiced her frustration with WNBA leadership following Lynx star Napheesa Collier‚Äôs candid critique of commissioner Cathy Engelbert. Dales revealed a personal experience of feeling overlooked by the league, shedding light on long-standing concerns among former players. Her reflections come at a moment when scrutiny over Engelbert‚Äôs leadership is intensifying.Dales, who was the third overall pick in the 2002 WNBA Draft by the Washington Mystics, recalled her efforts to support the league after retirement in 2008. ‚ÄúI hosted a prominent WNBA event a couple of years ago. ‚ÄòWelcome to the league, Toronto,‚Äô‚Äù Dales wrote on X. ‚ÄúThe Toronto team intro ‚Äî it was exceptional. The TO people were amazing. I did it for free. I never once heard from Cathy or the WNBA or league in general. Nothing. Not a single bump on their social media. Frankly, it seemed like she didn‚Äôt know I played for the league at all. I walked away wondering if she even knew me. I have never heard from the league since I left the game.‚ÄùShe contrasted her WNBA experience with her time in the NFL, noting, ‚ÄúThe NFL treats me so kindly. Not like this.‚Äù After retiring from professional basketball, Dales transitioned into broadcasting, joining NFL Network in 2009, where she hosts shows including NFL Now and NFL Total Access. Her career also includes seven years as a reporter and analyst for ESPN and ABC, covering multiple sports at the highest level.Dales‚Äô comments came shortly after Napheesa Collier criticized Engelbert at her exit press conference, calling her leadership ‚Äúnegligent.‚Äù Collier revealed that conversations she had with Engelbert about league officiating in February were dismissed, with Engelbert reportedly responding, ‚ÄúWell only the losers complain about the refs.‚Äù Collier‚Äôs statement concluded with a sharp observation: ‚ÄúWe have the best players in the world. We have the best fans in the world. But right now, we have the worst leadership in the world.‚ÄùDales praised Collier‚Äôs remarks, calling them ‚Äúincredibly profound, powerful, and detailed statement from one of the league‚Äôs premier athletes and class all the way.‚Äù Her own story reinforces a broader pattern of former players feeling disconnected from the WNBA, raising questions about how the league engages with its talent and honors their contributions.Also Read: What led former Dolphins star Xavien Howard to retire after only four games with the Colts?
Article Summary: Nfl reporter and ex-wnba star stacey dales calls out commissioner cathy engelbert. Dales revealed a personal experience of feeling overlooked by the league. Her reflections come at a moment when scrutiny over engelbert‚Äôs leadership is intensifying.

Article Title: "Everybody has to be on the same page": Justin Fields pushes Jets to fix mistakes and chase first win vs Cowboys
Article Text:
Justin Fields (Image credits: IG/X)

Justin Fields demands full accountability and discipline from players and coaches to turn close losses into wins

Explosive run game could be the key spark the Jets need to break through against tough opponents

Coach Aaron Glenn highlights Fields‚Äô unique athleticism and game-changing ability as Jets seek consistency

Justin Fields leads with energy and motivation to keep Jets‚Äô locker room positive amid early-season struggles

The New York Jets enter Week 5 still hunting for their first victory of the season, and quarterback Justin Fields insists the turnaround must begin on offense. With three of their four losses coming by a single score, Fields believes sharper execution, fewer penalties, and better ball security could be the difference between being ‚Äúclose‚Äù and finally breaking through. As the Jets prepare to host the Dallas Cowboys at MetLife Stadium, urgency is rising but so is belief that a breakthrough is near.Fields acknowledged that the Jets have not been outplayed so much as out-executed in critical moments. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve lost three games by one score,‚Äù he reflected, noting that minimizing turnovers and penalties would instantly flip narrow defeats into wins. For him, accountability extends beyond the locker room and onto the coaching staff as well. ‚ÄúTo secure those dubs, everybody has to be on the same page ‚Äî not only the players but the coaches and everyone around the building,‚Äù he said.Against recent opponents, the Jets showed flashes of a productive rushing attack that set the tone early. Fields highlighted the first drive last week where explosive runs carved through the defense, creating balance and rhythm. ‚ÄúThe run game makes my job easier,‚Äù he admitted, pointing to how sustained ground production opens lanes for both his arm and his legs.His dual-threat ability was on display with a highlight-reel 43-yard touchdown run that, according to head coach Aaron Glenn, might have covered nearly 90 yards of scrambling in total.Glenn did not hold back in applauding his quarterback‚Äôs resilience and athleticism. ‚ÄúHe never ceases to amaze me when he‚Äôs running with the ball,‚Äù the coach said. ‚ÄúBecause he‚Äôs such a big, strong man, able to elude and make people miss in space.‚Äù For Glenn, those are the kinds of plays the Jets have to build upon, knowing that Fields‚Äô improvisation can turn a stagnant drive into a game-changing moment. The challenge, however, remains sustaining that energy for four full quarters without costly lapses.As one of the team captains, Fields has leaned into his leadership role, rallying teammates through tough stretches. After Monday‚Äôs loss, he addressed the locker room to remind players that their confidence must not waver. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs my job as quarterback and as one of the leaders to make sure everybody feels that energy,‚Äù he said. Fields emphasized that morale remains high despite setbacks, with the group determined to ‚Äúget back to work this week and go out there on Sunday and play ball. ‚ÄùWith the Cowboys looming, the Jets know opportunities cannot be squandered. Cleaning up mental errors, sticking to the run game, and maximizing Fields‚Äô dynamic skillset are central to their game plan. For a team that has been on the verge of victories but unable to close, Week 5 provides both a test and a chance at redemption. If Fields‚Äô message of accountability resonates, MetLife Stadium could witness the Jets‚Äô long-awaited first win of the season.Also read: Who is Jason Taylor‚Äôs wife? Meet Monica Taylor, the woman behind his embarrassing ‚ÄòColdplay Moment‚Äô at Monday Night Football
Article Summary: Justin fields demands full accountability and discipline from players and coaches to turn close losses into wins. Coach aaron glenn highlights fields‚Äô unique athleticism and game-changing ability as jets seek consistency. The jets host the dallas cowboys at metlife stadium in week 5.

Article Title: ‚ÄúSeems Like Things Are Going Great‚Äù ‚Äî Tom Brady proclaims as Travis Kelce goes beyond Limits With Kansas City Chiefs and Taylor Swift
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

What Tom Brady said about Travis Kelce

Travis Kelce's achievements and recent challenges

Tom Brady's current endeavors beyond the comments

Tom Brady recently talked about how he manages his personal and professional life during the football season. In an interview centered on his Hertz ad campaign for their online car-buying service, he touched on Travis Kelce 's engagement to Taylor Swift , which was announced just before the NFL season started.During the interview, Brady gave some comforting tips to Kelce about juggling his football career and personal life. "It‚Äôs all part of growing up," Brady told TODAY.com.Brady also complimented Kelce's skills on the field, pointing out, ‚ÄúI really think Travis is a great player. I‚Äôve gotten a chance to cover him a lot.‚Äù He added that Kelce ‚Äúis going to go into the Hall of Fame as one of the great tight ends‚Äù He talked about how much he enjoys being an analyst for Kelce's games.Concluding his thoughts, Brady remarked, ‚ÄúSeems like things are going great,‚Äù talking about Kelce's success in his career and his romance with Swift. This optimistic view implies that Brady believes Kelce is effectively managing his rising fame and personal achievements while excelling in football, just like Brady did throughout his career.Travis Kelce has been a crucial part of the Chiefs' winning streak, helping them clinch the Vince Lombardi Trophy three times over five years.Being a tight end, he has become a prominent player in the league, which is remarkable by his accomplishing impressive levels of performance despite the significant attention his off-field activities receive.The loss for the Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl 59 was a major setback which prevented them from pulling off an amazing three-peat. Still, such comments from Brady do not appear to take away from Kelce's legacy or chances for success down the line.Right now, Brady is the main NFL analyst for Fox Sports and also a minority owner of the Las Vegas Raiders, keeping him closely tied to the game. Plus, he's part of a Hertz campaign that highlights their online car-buying services.Tom Brady is going to take part in the Fanatics Flag Football Classic on March 21, 2026, at Kingdom Arena in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Responding to rumors that this might mean he's coming back to play, Tom Brady explained, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not like I ever played flag football before, so I‚Äôm not technically unretiring to play. It‚Äôs kind of like a new initiative.‚Äù He pointed out the event's appeal, stating, ‚ÄúBut what I‚Äôve always loved about football is throwing the ball and connecting with my teammates and this would just be a really fun day to be a part of, and I think it‚Äôs going to be just a terrific event. ‚ÄùTravis Kelce is rocking it with the Kansas City Chiefs while navigating life in the limelight with Taylor Swift, proving he can take on every obstacle on and off the field with unmatched power.Also Read: Travis Kelce calls his birthday ‚Äúan annoying day‚Äù as the Kansas City Chiefs star about to turn 36
Article Summary: Tom brady recently talked about how he manages his personal and professional life during the football season. In an interview centered on his hertz ad campaign for their online car-buying service, he touched on travis kelce's engagement to taylor swift.

Article Title: Saquon Barkley‚Äôs daughter Jada and Brandon Graham‚Äôs daughter Emerson have innocent questions for Philadelphia Eagles stars
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Saquon Barkley, A. J. Brown, and Lane Johnson)

Which one of our dads (Saquon Barkley and Brandon Graham) is your favorite?

Eagles Get Interviewed By Kids Again

Who on the team says the most bad words?

Is Santa real?

What do you think about the Dallas Cowboys?

Would you rather ride a dinosaur or drive a monster truck?

What‚Äôs the scariest movie you‚Äôve ever seen?

Hereditary

Insidious

Final Destination

Courage the Cowardly Dog

Why are you so bald?

Also Read:

The innocence shines from these little angels! From picking favorites to asking, ‚ÄúWhy are you so bald?‚Äù ‚Äî Saquon Barkley ‚Äôs daughter Jada and Brandon Graham‚Äôs daughter Emerson are full of surprises! They recently interviewed Philadelphia Eagles star wide receivers DeVonta Smith and A. J. Brown, tight end Dallas Goedert, linebacker Zach Baun, offensive tackle Lane Johnson, running back Saquon Barkley, and safety Reed Blankenship. Ready for their innocent questions? Let‚Äôs dive in!Dallas Goedert answers that Saquon Barkley is his favorite because Barkley plays on offense, so he does not have to block him. He adds that blocking Brandon Graham during practice was really tough. Lane Johnson says he prefers Barkley's running game to Graham's but notes that Graham's trash talk is better than Barkley's. Reed Blankenship clearly chooses Barkley as his favorite.A.J. Brown playfully asks back, ‚ÄúBad words as in‚Ä¶what are bad words?‚Äù Jada sweetly reframes, ‚ÄúCan you at least tell us what, like what the letter starts with that they say?‚Äù Brown insists, ‚ÄúNobody says bad words on the team.‚Äù Jada chimes in, ‚ÄúMy dad does.‚Äù Emerson adds, ‚ÄúMy dad used to.‚Äù DeVonta Smith honestly admits to being the one who says the most bad words. Saquon agrees, adding, ‚ÄúSmitty.When he‚Äôs out there, he turns to a different guy. ‚ÄùZach Baun, Reed Blankenship, and DeVonta Smith all insist Santa is real. Dallas Goedert recollects a childhood memory, ‚ÄúI used to go and visit him all the time as a kid. When I was little, I even pulled on his beard because I thought maybe it was fake, and it was definitely real.‚Äù Saquon turns the question around‚ÄîEmerson and Jada both say Santa is real, so Barkley agrees.Zach Baun responds to the question by booing when asked about the Dallas Cowboys. Lane Johnson says he does not think much of the Cowboys. A.J. Brown considers the question but answers, 'I like everybody.' Reed Blankenship admits, 'We don't like them,' but wants Emerson‚Äôs brother's 'Dallas Sucks' necklace. Dallas Goedert says, 'I think the Dallas Cowboys stink.' Emerson quickly responds, 'No. No offense, but like no. ' Goedert concludes that they‚Äôre not a big fan of them, says Dallas is cool, but the Cowboys are no good.Zach Baun says he wants to ride a dinosaur because it would be so much fun! Lane Johnson also chooses a dinosaur. DeVonta Smith mentions he is not a big fan of monster trucks and picks a dinosaur, depending on the type. Saquon Barkley also says he'd rather ride a dinosaur. Barkley then asks the girls for their answers: Emerson chooses a monster truck. Jada does too, explaining that dinosaurs might eat, scream, or try to kill. Emerson adds, 'Bring you to their home.' Jada says, 'Feed them to your baby.'A.J. Brown shares that he does not watch scary movies. Lane Johnson also says he avoids them, referencing the film. When the girls ask Johnson what that scary movie is about, he replies that it‚Äôs about good people and bad people. Reed Blankenship picksas his scariest movie. DeVonta Smith chooses one of themovies. Zach Baun saysscares him.Zach Baun reacts to the question, 'Why are you so bald?' by exclaiming, 'So bald!' Emerson follows up by asking, 'And where did your hair go?' Baun holds back laughter, replying, 'Oh my gosh.' After pausing, he simply responds, 'I don't know.' Lane Johnson jokes, 'I think your dad (Brandon Graham) took it and put it on his back!' The girls burst into laughter. Johnson further jokes that Graham took all of his hair in his rookie year, and he never found it again.
Article Summary: Philadelphia eagles star wide receivers devonta smith and a.j. Brown, tight end dallas goedert, linebacker zach baun, offensive tackle lane johnson, running back saquon barkley, and safety reed blankenship were interviewed by emerson and jada graham. Who on the team says the most bad words? Is santa real?

Article Title: Will Emari Demercado lead the backfield? Cardinals‚Äô RB situation raises questions on TNF
Article Text:
Will Emari Demercado lead the backfield? Cardinals‚Äô RB situation raises questions on TNF (Image Via Getty)

Emari Demercado moves up after Trey Benson injury



Emari Demercado and Michael Carter prepare for bigger challenge

‚ÄúWe trust Emari and Michael to step in and compete,‚Äù

Emari Demercado is set for a much bigger role with the Arizona Cardinals starting Sunday, October 6, 2025, against the Tennessee Titans. The team announced that rookie running back Trey Benson will be placed on injured reserve with a knee injury, which means he will miss at least four games. With James Conner already out for the season due to a foot injury, the Cardinals will now lean heavily on Emari Demercado and Michael Carter to carry the load.Emari Demercado, 25, looked sharp in last week‚Äôs 23-20 loss to the Seattle Seahawks on Thursday night. In that game, he rushed twice for eight yards and caught both of his targets for 13 yards, including a touchdown reception.His quick play and ability to adjust to short passes gave the Cardinals confidence to use him more often. Trey Benson‚Äôs knee injury, suffered during the Week 4 game, changes the rotation.With Benson sidelined, Demercado and Michael Carter will share most of the snaps in the backfield. Carter, who weighs 201 pounds, has speed and receiving ability, but Demercado, at 215 pounds, is expected to handle more inside carries. Bam Knight, signed earlier this season, will move into the No. 3 running back role.Also Read: Cowboys Vs. Packers On Sunday Night Football: Micah Parsons‚Äô Dallas Return Fuels High-Stakes Week 4 Clash Head coach Jonathan Gannon spoke to reporters after practice on Friday in Tempe, Arizona.Gannon said. He praised Demercado‚Äôs energy and pointed out how quickly he has adjusted to the Cardinals‚Äô system.Michael Carter, 25, joined the Cardinals last year after spending time with the New York Jets. He will be used more in passing plays, while Demercado could see an increase in short-yardage and red-zone work. This mix makes both players important for fantasy football managers, especially in point-per-reception formats.With James Conner on season-ending injured reserve since September, and now Trey Benson out, the Cardinals may look to add another running back in the coming weeks. For now, the spotlight turns to Emari Demercado, who will get his first real chance to lead the Cardinals‚Äô backfield this Sunday in Nashville against the Titans.
Article Summary: Emari demercado is set for a much bigger role with the arizona cardinals starting sunday, october 6, 2025, against the tennessee titans. The team announced that rookie running back trey benson will be placed on injured reserve with a knee injury.

Article Title: Erik Johnson bids farewell to NHL after a remarkable career
Article Text:
Erik Johnson (Image Via Twitter)

Erik Johnson‚Äôs retirement confirmed by Colorado Avalanche

Erik Johnson‚Äôs legacy and lasting impact on hockey

Erik Johnson Equalizes For the Avalanche With Blue Line Snipe

The NHL may have had its own surprises during each season, yet sometimes the offseason brings the most emotional moments. Now, the fans, analysts, and even some former players are thinking about Erik Johnson: a name that used to be synonymous with steady defense, leadership, and championship mettle. The Avalanche faithful know just how much Johnson has been a central figure in their identity. In a way, his retirement marks the end of an era and the celebration of a life defined by resilience and loyalty.Wednesday afternoon saw the official announcement via social media from the Colorado Avalanche that Erik Johnson had decided to retire from professional hockey. The 17-year veteran spent 14 years in Colorado, playing in 1,023 games and recording 348 points derived from 95 goals and 253 assists. The trusted blue-liner also logged 1,717 blocked shots and 1,695 hits, leaving a physical imprint on the game.In a way, the 2021‚Äì22 season marked the climax of his career, winning the Stanley Cup for the Avalanche. Johnson probably felt 18 years in the NHL was enough, and, with immense gratitude in his farewell message, he announced his retirement. A word of thanks to the Avalanche, his former teams, his teammates, coaches, and fans, but most of all to his family that has stood by him through it all.He stated that hockey was his life, and now he looked toward the future with lots of excitement but also with a heart full of fond memories given by the sport to him.The Blues drafted Johnson in 2006 first overall, making him one of only two American-born defensemen ever to receive that honor. Apart from his draft-day history, Johnson became one of only six defensemen chosen first overall to actually skate in 1,000 NHL games. Other than with the Blues, Sabres, and Flyers, Colorado remained his true hockey home.There were alleged PTO opportunities, but Johnson was adamant about doing it on his terms, walking away with dignity. Unbeaten for his consistency and leadership, he stands eighth in games played on the Avalanche's all-time leaderboard. To fans, he was more than just a player; he was a defining element of the franchise for two decades.With the retirement of Erik Johnson, a chapter of grit, loyalty, sacrifice, and championship memories closes. While life will go on in the NHL, his presence in Colorado and all across the league will stand as an inspiration to young defensemen who are vying to live the same dream.Also Read: New Jersey Devils lock down defenseman Luke Hughes with 7-year $63 million deal
Article Summary: Colorado avalanche defenseman erik johnson announced his retirement on wednesday. The 17-year veteran spent 14 years in colorado, playing in 1,023 games and recording 348 points derived from 95 goals and 253 assists. The blues drafted johnson in 2006 first overall, making him one of only two american-born defensemen ever to receive that honor.

Article Title: "He doesn‚Äôt have the gear to win‚Äù: Auston Matthews‚Äô ability to lead the Toronto Maple Leafs to a championship questioned by former NHL star Sean Avery
Article Text:
Auston Matthews gets brutally criticised.(Image via Brace Hemmelgarn-Imagn Images)

Auston Matthews gets slammed by former NHL player Sean Avery



Auston Matthews‚Äô performance on the ice was highly criticised in the last season



The Toronto Maple Leafs‚Äô captain and one of the most popular players in the league, Auston Matthews, had a rough season last time as he was dealing with his injuries. The Leafs‚Äô captain ended up appearing in only 67 games last season and the team recorded a pretty poor performance on the ice. While things were looking hopeful for Auston Matthews initially in the new season, the Toronto Maple Leafs have already lost two of the four preseason matches held in the last few days, and now, this has raised eyebrows about the star player‚Äôs performance.A few hours ago, former NHL player Sean Avery made a few controversial remarks about the Toronto Maple Leafs‚Äô captain.Former NHL player Sean Avery made an appearance on the Spittin‚Äô Chicklets podcast, where he slammed Auston Matthews.He said, "Auston Matthews, if there's a guy right now in the league that I say that might not have the next gear to win, he might be at the top of my list‚Ä¶Elias Patterson might be second."While Auston Matthews has not reacted to Sean Avery‚Äôs comments on his performance yet, the Toronto Maple Leafs GM, Brad Treliving, had praised him a few days back.The Toronto Maple Leafs GM, Brad Treliving, made an appearance on Sportsnet's The Real Kyper & Bourne, where he spoke about Auston Matthews' return to the ice this season.The Toronto Maple Leafs GM, Brad Treliving, said, ‚ÄúTo me, it starts with his preparation. He was back here early in the summer. It is amazing; when he shows up, it seems like everyone else is here now, too. He was here probably a month before we got going, and with the preparation he puts toward his craft and the way he practices, he sets the standard.‚ÄùAuston Matthews spent the whole of last season trying to recover from his injuries and could only participate in 67 games total. This had sparked concern among fans as many criticised his focus and performance on the ice.While Auston Matthews looks pretty fit in the new season, the recent losses in the preseason has sparked some concern and panic among the Leafs' fans.Also Read: "He's in a position of power": Chris Pronger and Luke Gazdic react to Connor McDavid‚Äôs uncertain future with the Edmonton Oilers
Article Summary: Former nhl player sean avery slammed auston matthews on the spittin‚Äô chicklets podcast. The toronto maple leafs gm, brad treliving, had praised the star player a few days back. The recent losses in the preseason has sparked some concern and panic among the leafs' fans.

Article Title: Russell Wilson caught looking ‚Äòdisgusted‚Äô during Jaxson Dart‚Äôs locker room speech, and fans are losing it
Article Text:
Charles Wenzelberg/NY Post

Giants locker room drama: Russell Wilson looks ‚Äòdisgusted‚Äô during Dart‚Äôs postgame hype speech



Not all fans are convinced that this is the ‚Äúlook of hatred‚Äù



Giants fans, the drama is real. A video from Sunday‚Äôs locker room has gone viral, showing Russell Wilson giving rookie QB Jaxson Dart a look that can only be described as ‚Äúdisgusted.‚Äù Dart, fresh off leading the Giants to a 21‚Äì18 upset over the previously undefeated Chargers, was delivering a pumped-up postgame speech when Wilson‚Äôs unimpressed glare stole the show. The clip quickly spread across X (formerly Twitter), and fans can‚Äôt stop talking about what that side-eye really meant.Context is everything here. Wilson, who started the season as the Giants‚Äô quarterback, was benched after an 0‚Äì3 start, paving the way for Dart to take over the offense.Sunday‚Äôs win marked Dart‚Äôs first major statement as the team‚Äôs starter, and his locker room speech was full of energy, motivation, and hype for the team.Meanwhile, Wilson was caught looking, well, less than thrilled. Whether it was frustration, disbelief, or just a classic ‚Äúbenchwarmer mood,‚Äù his expression instantly became a meme-worthy moment for fans.As soon as the video hit social media, fans went wild. The clip sparked heated debates about team dynamics, the QB room vibe, and whether Wilson‚Äôs reaction hinted at tension behind the scenes or if he was simply a stoic competitor.Before fans spiral into full conspiracy mode, it‚Äôs important to note that Wilson has publicly expressed support for Dart and emphasized his commitment to the Giants. Still, a picture or in this case, a side-eye video can speak louder than words. The moment has added a new layer of intrigue to the Giants‚Äô quarterback saga, keeping fans glued to social media as they analyze every subtle expression and gesture from the locker room.Locker room dynamics aside, the Giants now have an energized rookie leading the offense while a veteran quarterback watches from the sidelines. Wilson‚Äôs viral glare reminds everyone that competition breeds tension, but it also pushes the team to improve. Whether his expression was innocent, iconic, or somewhere in between, one thing is clear, fans will be watching, laughing, and debating every step of the way, especially as Dart continues to prove he belongs under center.Also read - Malik Nabers‚Äô knee injury looks worse than it is‚Äîhere‚Äôs why Giants fans can chill
Article Summary: Russell wilson gave rookie qb jaxson dart a look that can only be described as ‚Äúdisgusted.‚Äù dart was delivering a pumped-up postgame speech when wilson‚Äôs unimpressed glare stole the show. The clip quickly spread across x (formerly twitter), and fans can‚Äôt stop talking about what that side-eye really meant.

Article Title: Luke Hughes‚Äô $63M contract ensures New Jersey Devils keep Luke Hughes and Jack Hughes together through 2030s
Article Text:
Credit: ¬© Kyle Ross

Luke Hughes signs seven-year, $63M contract, stays with brother Jack in New Jersey Devils lineup

‚Äúa ways apart‚Äù

New Jersey Devils manage roster and family dynamic with Hughes brothers

The New Jersey Devils have secured young defenseman Luke Hughes for the long term, agreeing to a seven-year, $63 million contract. The deal keeps Luke alongside his brother Jack Hughes in New Jersey, strengthening the team‚Äôs blue line for the foreseeable future. After tense negotiations this summer, the Devils have locked in one of the NHL‚Äôs top young defensemen for years to come.Luke Hughes, drafted fourth overall in 2021, has developed into a promising offensive defenseman, recording seven goals and 37 assists in 71 games last season. While his current stats are strong, the Devils are investing in his future potential, hoping he evolves into a cornerstone of their defense. The contract includes a 10-team no-trade clause for the sixth and seventh seasons, giving Hughes some flexibility later in the deal.Negotiations had initially stalled, with Hughes and the Devils described asafter his entry-level contract expired. Head coach Sheldon Keefe reportedly expressed concern about Hughes‚Äô absence from practices during the talks. The agreement now secures Luke Hughes through the 2030s, providing stability for both the player and the team.The deal also keeps two of the three Hughes brothers, Luke and Jack, together in the same dressing room. Jack Hughes, the Devils‚Äô first overall pick in 2019, is entering the fourth season of his eight-year, $64 million contract. Their older brother Quinn Hughes, drafted seventh overall in 2018 and currently with the Vancouver Canucks, will become an unrestricted free agent after the 2026-27 season. While reuniting all three Hughes brothers in New Jersey would require careful salary cap management, fans are excited about the possibility.The Devils‚Äô strategy highlights both their commitment to young talent and their willingness to invest in potential. Luke Hughes‚Äô new contract positions him as one of the NHL‚Äôs higher-paid defensemen at $9 million per season, surpassing his brothers‚Äô current salaries. The long-term deal ensures that the Hughes duo can develop chemistry on the ice while contributing to the team‚Äôs ambitions.By signing Luke Hughes to a seven-year, $63 million deal, the New Jersey Devils have reinforced their defense and kept two Hughes brothers together for the foreseeable future. The contract reflects both the team‚Äôs confidence in Luke‚Äôs potential and its commitment to building around young talent, giving fans optimism for sustained success in the coming seasons.Also Read: Seattle Kraken lose defenseman Ryker Evans for up to two months with upper-body injury setback in 2025-26 NHL season
Article Summary: The new jersey devils have signed defenseman luke hughes to a seven-year, $63 million contract. The deal keeps luke alongside his brother jack in new jersey for the foreseeable future. Luke hughes' new contract positions him as one of the nhl‚Äôs higher-paid defensemen at $9 million per season.

Article Title: India vs West Indies 1st Test Live Streaming: When and Where to Watch IND vs WI Match on TV and Online
Article Text:
Ahmedabad: India's captain Shubman Gill during a training session ahead of the first Test cricket match between India and West Indies, in Ahmedabad. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Here's all you need to know about the

India vs West Indies 1st Test Live Streaming

India vs West Indies 1st Test Live Streaming: How to Watch Online

India vs West Indies 1st Test: Match Details

How To Watch Live Streaming Of India vs West Indies 1st Test?

When Will The Toss For India Vs West Indies, 1st Test Be Held?

India vs West Indies squads

India:

West Indies:

India, fresh from their Asia Cup victory, are set to face West Indies in the first Test starting Thursday in Ahmedabad, with captain Shubman Gill's team being clear favorites against an undermanned Caribbean side on a green-top pitch. The match holds significance for World Test Championship points, with India currently placed third in the standings, as both teams prepare for different weather conditions and a notably green pitch at the venue.This Test marks the first of four home games for India in the WTC 2025-27 cycle, following their impressive 2-2 draw in England that kept them ahead of the English team in rankings.The Ahmedabad pitch presents a departure from typical Indian conditions, featuring a green surface under cloudy skies. While hot and humid conditions prevail, potential rain interruptions are not expected to significantly impact the game.The first Test between India and West Indies will be televised in India on the Star Sports Network.The first Test between India and the West Indies will be played from Thursday, October 2, at the Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad. The match will start at 9:30 AM IST.The live streaming of India versus West Indies 1st Test will be available on the JioHotstar app and website.The toss for India versus West Indies 1st Test will take place at 9:00 AM IST.Shubman Gill (c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, KL Rahul, Dhruv Jurel (wk), N Jagadeesan (wk), Devdutt Padikkal, B Sai Sudharsan, Ravindra Jadeja, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Jasprit Bumrah, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna.Roston Chase (c), Kevlon Anderson, Alick Athanaze, John Campbell, Tagenarine Chanderpaul, Shai Hope (wk), Tevin Imlach (wk), Brandon King, Justin Greaves, Johann Layne, Khary Pierre, Jomel Warrican, Jayden Seales, Anderson Phillip, Jediah Blades.
Article Summary: The first test between india and west indies will be played from thursday, october 2, at the narendra modi stadium, ahmedabad. The toss for india versus west indies 1st test will take place at 9:00 am ist. The match will be televised in india on the star sports network. The live streaming will be available on the jiohotstar app and website.

Article Title: Did Heather McMahan go too far? Ryder Cup emcee breaks silence after Rory McIlroy chant
Article Text:
Did Heather McMahan go too far? Ryder Cup emcee breaks silence after Rory McIlroy chant (Image Via Getty)

‚ÄúSalem-witch esque‚Äù

‚Äúreally tough.‚Äù

Heather McMahan explains Ryder Cup exit after Rory McIlroy chant backlash



‚Äúf‚Äî you, Rory‚Äù

Rory McIlroy reacts to Ryder Cup chaos at Bethpage Black

Heather McMahan, the comedian who emceed at the Ryder Cup, has spoken out after she resigned following a vulgar chant aimed at Rory McIlroy. The chant began on Saturday at Bethpage Black on Long Island, New York, before the second day of matches. McMahan said she did not start the chant but joined in, then apologised. In a TikTok comment, she called the heavy online blameand said the whole scene wasThe PGA of America confirmed she stepped down and said she had apologised to Rory McIlroy and Ryder Cup Europe.Heather McMahan was on the first tee, trying to lead cheers for players, when the crowd turned on Rory McIlroy. Video shows her first trying a chant for Bryson DeChambeau before a louder chant oftook over, and she can be heard joining in over the microphone.McMahan later wrote that she deeply regretted responding to the crowd and apologised directly to McIlroy and Team Europe. She added that the online reaction felt extreme and compared it to old witch-hunt blame.The PGA of America released a short statement saying she had resigned from her emcee role. Influencers and some fans defended her, saying the blame felt unfair and that the moment grew out of a volatile crowd.Also Read: Why Comedian Heather McMahan Apologized After Targeting Rory McIlroy At The Ryder Cup Rory McIlroy and his Team Europe teammates met heavy jeers during the Ryder Cup at Bethpage Black. After Europe won 15-13, McIlroy told reporters the behaviour crossed a line. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think we should ever accept that in golf,‚Äù he said, asking fans to show respect and better conduct.Media reports said some spectators were ejected and that objects were thrown near the ropes. The PGA of America apologised to Team Europe and said it would review crowd control and emcee policies to avoid repeats at future events.Her resignation was announced on Sunday after Team Europe closed out the victory. Fans debated the moment on social media. Several players and pundits urged clearer rules to protect players and their families from abuse.
Article Summary: Heather mcmahan has resigned from her role as ryder cup emcee. The pga of america confirmed she stepped down and said she had apologised to rory mcilroy and ryder cup europe. The chant began on saturday at bethpage black before the second day of matches. Mcmahan said she did not start the chant but joined in, then apologised.

Article Title: Shahid Afridi warns PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi after Pakistan's Asia Cup debacle - 'It would be a big decision'
Article Text:
Shahid Afridi warns PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi (Agency Photos)

Abhishek Sharma trolls Shaheen Afridi, smashes Pakistan bowlers and dominates

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Former Pakistan cricket captain Shahid Afridi has urged Mohsin Naqvi to step down from one of his two positions - either as Pakistan Cricket Board chairman or as Minister of Interior.Afridi believes Pakistan cricket requires full attention, which Naqvi cannot provide while managing both roles simultaneously.Naqvi's tenure as PCB chairman since 2024 has been marked by challenges. Under his leadership, Pakistan has struggled in home Test matches, the 2025 Champions Trophy, and now in the Asia Cup.Despite improved performance under new coach Mike Hesson, the team's showing in the 2025 Asia Cup was mixed, with victories overshadowed by three losses against India."My request or advice to Naqvi Saheb is that these are two very important posts, and they are big jobs that need time. PCB is totally different from the Interior Ministry, so it must be kept separate," Afridi told Telecom Asia Sport."It would be a big decision and should be taken as soon as possible. Pakistan cricket needs special attention and time‚Ä¶ Naqvi cannot rely totally on advisers. These advisers are taking him nowhere and he himself says that he doesn't know much about cricket. He needs to appoint good and competent advisers who know about the game."Naqvi's responsibilities have expanded further with his appointment as chairman of the Asian Cricket Council (ACC). His leadership during the 2025 Asia Cup was marked by controversy, particularly regarding his interactions with India.The tournament's conclusion was notable for an incident during the trophy presentation. When India emerged victorious, they expressed reluctance to receive the trophy from Naqvi, citing his previous anti-India positions.In response, Naqvi left the stadium with the winners' trophy.These events have added to the growing pressure on Naqvi, who continues to balance his multiple roles in Pakistani cricket administration and government. His effectiveness in managing these diverse responsibilities has become a subject of discussion in cricket circles.
Article Summary: Shahid afridi has urged mohsin naqvi to step down from one of his two positions - either as pakistan cricket board chairman or as minister of interior. The former pakistan cricket captain believes pakistan cricket requires full attention, which naquvi cannot provide while managing both roles simultaneously.

Article Title: 'I abused a lot': Shikhar Dhawan breaks silence on fight with Virat Kohli
Article Text: Shikhar Dhawan recently disclosed past conflicts with Virat Kohli, including a shoulder-tackling incident during warm-ups and a heated run-out that coincided with Dhawan's IPL auction disappointment. He also reflected on Kohli's early focus and increased seriousness after his father's passing. These revelations highlight their competitive dynamic and enduring professional relationship.
Article Summary: Shikhar dhawan recently disclosed past conflicts with virat kohli. These revelations highlight their competitive dynamic and enduring professional relationship. He also reflected on kohli's early focus and increased seriousness after his father's passing. Click here for more ipl news.
